name: spirit-of-kiro-game
description: Spirit of Kiro game with native Node.js execution

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:images"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client" "npm run start:images"
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:dynamodb && npm run setup:cognito
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && bun test" "cd client && npm run test:unit"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && echo 'Server build not needed'" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && bun install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../item-images && bun install
